mapper.select: select m.name member ,s.name package,o.orderDate orderDate,o.orderType orderType from t_order o, t_member m, t_package s where o.member_id=m.id and o.package_id=s.id and o.id=#{id}
select count(id) from t_order where orderDate = #{value}
select count(id) from t_order where orderDate >= #{value}
select count(id) from t_order where orderDate = #{value} and orderStatus = '已到诊'
select count(id) from t_order where orderDate >= #{value} and orderStatus = '已到诊'

select p.name, count(1) count, count(1)/t.total proportion, remark from t_order o, t_package p, (select count(1) total from t_order) t where o.package_id = p.id group by package_id order by proportion desc limit 0,4
SELECT p.name AS package, o.orderDate, m.name AS member, o.orderType FROM t_package p,t_member m,t_order o WHERE o.member_id=m.id AND p.id=o.package_id AND o.id=#{id};
select count(id) from t_order where orderDate between #{startDate} and #{endDate}
